case.title: Help for the summer $$$ - 40 (Upper East Side)
case.text:
If you are 18-30 white Asian or Spanish woman ,nice and fun then I can help you make some $$$.
I am a 6ft tall white clean cut male in good shape. Looking for safe fun for the summer season I hope this would grow into a steady thing.
I will offer up to 400 per meeting.
No pic no reply
